about_the_game:
The Yakuza: Like a Dragon Management Mode Set includes three sets of Management Mode Employees.

  • The Legendary Employees set adds Kazuma Kiryu, Goro Majima, Taiga Saejima, Daigo Dojima, and Masaru Watase to the Management Mode roster.

  • The Reliable Employees set adds Makoto Date, Seong-hui, Nick Ogata, and Hamako to the Management Mode roster.

  • The Hostess Employees set adds Yuki and Koyuki to the Management Mode roster.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Blood, Intense Violence,  Partial Nudity, Sexual Themes, Strong Language, and Use of Alcohol.
